welcome_benefits: 10,000 Skyward Miles and Emirates Skywards Silver Tier Membership

Movie & Dining: Buy 1 Get 1 Free Up to ₹750 on Movie Bookings. Exclusive Dining Offers With ICICI Bank Culinary Treats Programme
Rewards Rate: 2.5 Skyward Miles for every Rs. 100 spend on all transactions and 1 Skyward Mile on every Rs. 100 spent on insurance and utilities.
Reward Redemption: The earned Skywards Miles can be redeemed via Emirates Skywards website against travel-related spends.
Domestic Lounge Access: Complimentary Unlimited Access to Domestic Airport Lounges
International Lounge Access: Free Unlimited International Airport Lounge Access

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: On all fuel transactions up to ₹ 4,000, you will get a surcharge waiver of 1%.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: Higher of Rs. 500 or 2.5% of the amount withdrawn.

product_details: 10,000 bonus Skywards Miles as a joining benefit.
For every Rs. 100 spent, you will get 2.5 Skyward Miles.
Unlimited complimentary access to domestic as well as international lounges.
Skywards Miles Gold Tier membership on achieving the milestone spend.
Under the ICICI Bank Culinary Treats Programme, you will get exclusive deals on dining.
Buy 1 Get 1 Free offer on movie tickets four times every month.
Surcharge waiver of 1% on fuel transactions.
